title: Strawberry Limeade Recipe
description: This strawberry limeade is a refreshing summer cooler that's easy to make with frozen strawberries and lime juice, and even easier to enjoy!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Strawberry Limeade 4.7 (63) 50 Reviews 11 Photos An easy strawberry limeade made with frozen strawberries and lime juice. This is a deliciously refreshing frozen drink! Submitted by dancerathlete Updated on April 19, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 11 11 11 11 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings ½ cup lime juice 2 cups cold water ¼ cup white sugar 1 ½ cups frozen sliced strawberries 5 cubes ice Directions Place lime juice, cold water, sugar, and strawberries in blender and blend on high until smooth. While blender is running, add ice cubes one at a time. I Made It Print 97 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 57 Calories 0g Fat 15g Carbs 0g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 57 % Daily Value * Total Fat 0g 0% Sodium 4mg 0% Total Carbohydrate 15g 5% Dietary Fiber 1g 4% Total Sugars 11g Protein 0g 1% Vitamin C 29mg 32% Calcium 15mg 1% Iron 0mg 2% Potassium 107mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Strawberry Limeade 01 of 11 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 11 Photo by  Tara Jernigan 08/20/2016 I made this today amd will be making it again! I cut the recipe in half to make just one serving and I used bottled lime juice. 03 of 11 Photo by  Vanesa De la Cruz 05/20/2016 04 of 11 Photo by  Paula 05/15/2016 Such a refreshing drink. Sweet and tart at the same time. I used the juice of a real lime but subbed stevia for the sugar. Delicious! Would be a great mocktail for a party as well. 05 of 11 Photo by  lutzflcat 05/15/2016 5.16.16 Used fresh strawberries, so I did add a little more of the crushed ice (we like drinks like this slushy), and cut back on the sugar (personal taste preference). Good thirst quencher! 06 of 11 Photo by  Amanda Carter 04/30/2015 Easy and delicious! I substituted the water for Sprite. 07 of 11 Photo by  House of Aqua 04/04/2014 Great treat for my daughter. 08 of 11 Photo by  sharipassey 07/27/2011 09 of 11 Photo by  Lesli 07/17/2010 Needed to use up limes and strawberries so this recipe was perfect! Squeezed real limes for the juice. Used a pound of fresh strawberries. Used about 2 cups of ice cubes. I would have added more sugar if I wasn't on a diet, but it was still super delicious! 10 of 11 Photo by  Pam Ziegler Lutz 08/10/2009 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Watermelon and Strawberry Lemonade 193 Ratings Frozen Strawberry Lemonade 44 Ratings Gordon's Berry Breakfast Drink 46 Ratings Rico's Passionate Pink Honey Lemonade 44 Ratings Strawberry Basil Margarita 55 Ratings Easy Strawberry Lemonade 132 Ratings Mongolian Strawberry Orange Juice Smoothie 164 Ratings Basic Fruit Smoothie 86 Ratings Triple Threat Fruit Smoothie 179 Ratings Lemon Berry Slushy 79 Ratings Brazilian Lemonade 473 Ratings Watermelon Strawberry Mango Lemonade Smoothie 5 Ratings Cuban Mojito 45 Ratings Frozen Strawberry Margarita 57 Ratings Strawberry-Ginger-Mint Lemonade Rebecca's Rockin' Vodka Lemonade 60 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: dancerathlete
instructions: Place lime juice, cold water, sugar, and strawberries in blender and blend on high until smooth. While blender is running, add ice cubes one at a time.
